CustomField.description: Field used for VVS (Vista Value Selling) Closing Plan
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Do I adequately understand all key threats and is my response is sufficient?
CustomField.label: Purchase Process: Key Threats

value.fullName: 1 - I've just started capturing this information
value.label: 1 - I've just started capturing this information

value.fullName: 2 - I understand the key threats to this deal
value.label: 2 - I understand the key threats to this deal

value.fullName: 3 - The buyers have confirmed that I've adequately addressed the key threats
value.label: 3 - The buyers have confirmed that I've adequately addressed the key threats
